segments.text: Mr . Black , when is the earliest shipment you can make ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid shipment by early May would be too late for us . Our customs formalities are quite complicated , and it takes time to distribute the goods to the farmers in our country . The fertilizers must be delivered before April , or else we can't be in time for the spring sowing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , we will have to improve one month further on the time . Now is Jan . If the fertilizers should be shipped before the end of March , only 2 months are left . The time is too limited .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You understand a timely delivery is very important to us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . You can rest assured that we will do everything possible to advance shipment . The fertilizers will be delivered before April .
segments.speaker: S2
